blogPost.excerpt: Snapblooms is an ecommerce platform for ordering floral bouquets. With over 500+ florists already using our cloud solution Hana Florist POS, this is our attempt to bring customers close to flower shops and provide high quality, farm-fresh flowers.
blogPost.body: Snapblooms is an ecommerce platform for ordering floral bouquets. With over 500+ florists already using our cloud solution Hana Florist POS, this is our attempt to bring customers close to flower shops and provide high quality, farm-fresh flowers.
blogPost.title: Snapblooms - Flowers with a difference  🌼
blogPost.author: Neeraj Thakur

localize.description: Snapblooms是一个订购花束的电子商务平台。目前已经有超过500家花店在使用我们的云端解决方案Hana Florist POS，这是我们的尝试，让顾客接近花店，提供高品质的农场新鲜鲜花。
Snapblooms是一個訂購花束的電子商務平臺。目前已經有超過500家花店在使用我們的雲端解決方案Hana Florist POS，這是我們的嘗試，讓顧客接近花店，提供高品質的農場新鮮鮮花。

previous.excerpt: Shuffle is an online editor for Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, Bulma, and Material-UI. Today, we are launching our marketplace and two new UI libraries for Tailwind! https://shuffle.dev/marketplace
previous.title: UI Libraries by Shuffle - A marketplace for busy front-end developers

localize.tagline: 为繁忙的前端开发者提供一个市场

localize.tagline: 爲繁忙的前端開發者提供一個市場

localize.description: 與家人和朋友在線玩棋盤、紙牌和派對遊戲，或召集您的遠程團隊進行有趣的團隊建設活動。GameApart可與任何視頻會議平臺配合使用。每月都會發布新遊戲。讓我們開始這場遠程聚會吧!
